name: HMIS 005 Integrated Antenatal Register
description: Entry form for patients enrolled for ANC services

answers.label: NEG: Counselled, tested, and given HIV Negative results
POS: Counselled, tested, and given HIV Positive results
INC: Counselled, tested, and given HIV Inconclusive results
UKN: Not tested, and HIV status is Unknown
1st Time: Counselled and tested for the first time during this ANC Attendance
Re-Attd: Known HIV status from a previous ANC Attendance not eligible for a re-test in ANC
Retest: Client  re-tested for HIV during this visit
Known POS: Known HIV positive status who did not attend Antenantal from any health facility

sections.label: WHO Clinical Stage / CD4 / Viral Load

answers.label: New - Client Initiated on ART for eMTCT on this visit
Known ART - Client already on HAART prior to ANC first visit
Refill - Revisiting HIV Positive client already on ART
ND: No HIV drugs given in maternity
No history, signs and symptoms of GBV
Rx: Tested positive for Syphilis/Hepatitis B and results were given; treatment initiated
+Ve: Tested positive for Syphilis/Hepatitis B and results were given, but treatment not yet initiated
NR: Client tested negative for Syphilis/Hepatitis B and results were given
NT: Not tested for Syphilis/Hepatitis B
P: Eligible for prophylaxis and initiated on ARVs
NP: Eligible for prophylaxis but not initiated on ARVs
LT-Rx: Eligible for life long treatment and treated
LTN: Eligible for life long treatment but not treated
NE: Not Eligible for prophylaxis or lifelong treatment
Rx: Tested positive for Syphilis/Hepatitis B and results were given; treatment initiated
+Ve: Tested positive for Syphilis/Hepatitis B and results were given, but treatment not yet initiated
NR: Client tested negative for Syphilis/Hepatitis B and results were given
NT: Not tested for Syphilis/Hepatitis B
P: Eligible for prophylaxis and initiated on ARVs
NP: Eligible for prophylaxis but not initiated on ARVs
LT-Rx: Eligible for life long treatment and treated
LTN: Eligible for life long treatment but not treated
NE: Not Eligible for prophylaxis or lifelong treatment
ND: Not due for the dose at that visit

questions.label: Number of Iron & Folic Acid Combined pills
Number of Multiple Micronutrient Supplements pills
Complications and Risk Factors found after assessment
